name: Tilt Me
description:
Tilt Me is:

  • Endless thread miller.
  • Tilt the board to move your ball and avoid obstacles.
  • Obstacles do different effects.
  • Collect coins to buy skins!

Instructions: 
Dodge the obstacles, collect coins and go for the highest score possible!
Windows - WASD to control the board, mouse to navigate
Android - Tilt phone to control the board.

Extract the zip file of your platform of choice and play.

Project developed during mini-production 1 of Rapid Gaming Prototyping course in Media Design School, NZ, 2018.

Team Cleanup:
